duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure seamless delivery of projects and drive deployment of project delivery structure
Engage with clients to deploy multiple solutions and enhance customer satisfaction
Review MIS and reports to monitor and track project delivery management
Hire adequate and right resources for the team and ensure talent management
Lead engagement initiatives for the team and drive operational excellence
Interact with internal and external stakeholders for strategy, automation, talent acquisition, and compliance

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or relevant field (Master's preferred)
